Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package cf-cli for versions less than 8.7.11-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package cf-cli for versions less than 8.7.11-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cf-cli is earlier than 8.7.11-1, affected by CVE-2023-48795
